column5: A tragic and preventable loss of life.  http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/34785425/ns/us_news-life/   Just a reminder to wear floatation when snowmobiling across frozen bodies of water!
My prayers for the family.  A terrible tragedy.
5 went thru the ice and 2 survived, just imagine how the 2 that survived are feeling after watching a 3 year old and her mommy and granddaddy die!
